projectName: Girls Just Want to Have Fun (Animated)
description: The software used for this project was after effects.
In this project I displayed skills and knowledge of kinetic movement with objects and being able to create a motion parallax effect with the background and objects that are close to the camera.
There was a lot of work that went into using the puppet tool to make the characters move in a way where they're skipping, waving, gesturing etc.
A lot of work has been done through animating the girl skipping because I had to do research on what each body position is for every frame of the skipping sequence is which was quite tricky.
The software used for this project was after effects.
This project mainly focused on the use of the extended software that After effects use which was Cinema 4d.
